about.visionText: We believe in a future where artificial intelligence is accessible to everyone and contributes positively to society. Our mission is to create innovative AI solutions that transform businesses and improve everyday life.

member1.name: Sophie Martin
member1.bio: 10 years of experience in AI and development. Passionate about technological innovation.

member2.name: Thomas Dubois
member2.bio: Expert in cloud architecture and distributed systems. Open source contributor.

member3.name: Julie Bernard
member3.bio: Specialist in machine learning and natural language processing.

value.innovation.desc: We constantly push the boundaries of technology to create innovative AI solutions adapted to modern challenges.
value.excellence.desc: We are committed to delivering exceptional quality work in all aspects of our projects and interactions.
value.ethics.desc: We develop AI responsibly, emphasizing transparency, fairness, and data privacy.
value.collaboration.desc: We believe in the power of collaboration to solve complex problems and create more robust solutions.

services.title: Our Expertise
services.heading: Artificial Intelligence Solutions
services.subtitle: Innovative and tailored technologies to transform your business in the digital and artificial intelligence era.

cta.title: Need a solution not listed here?
cta.description: We also develop custom solutions tailored to your specific needs. Contact us to discuss your project.

web-dev.title: Web Development
web-dev.description: Innovative web applications with modern and high-performance interfaces.
web-dev.useCase: Creation of a responsive e-learning platform with administrator dashboard for a language school, integrating AI features for analyzing student progress.

mobile-dev.title: Mobile Development
mobile-dev.description: Native and cross-platform mobile applications for iOS and Android.
mobile-dev.useCase: Development of a mobile health tracking application for a medical startup, with real-time data synchronization and personalized AI-based analytics.

ai-solutions.title: Artificial Intelligence Solutions
ai-solutions.description: Custom artificial intelligence to automate and optimize your processes.
ai-solutions.useCase: Creation of an anomaly detection system for an industrial group, enabling real-time identification of production defects through computer vision.

automation.title: Automation
automation.description: Automate your workflows and improve your operational efficiency.
automation.useCase: Implementation of an automation system for a law firm, reducing time spent on repetitive administrative tasks by 70% and decreasing human error.

services.description: We develop cutting-edge AI solutions to optimize your processes, analyze your data, and create exceptional user experiences.

conversational.title: Conversational AI
conversational.description: Intelligent assistants capable of understanding natural language and interacting smoothly with your users.

dataAnalysis.title: Data Analysis
dataAnalysis.description: Transform your raw data into actionable insights with our advanced predictive and descriptive analytics models.

automation.title: Automation
automation.description: Optimize your business processes by automating repetitive tasks to reduce errors and increase productivity.

vision.title: Visual Recognition
vision.description: Analyze images and videos with our computer vision models to detect objects, people, and behaviors.

nlp.title: Natural Language Processing
nlp.description: Analyze and understand human language with our advanced NLP models for information extraction and sentiment analysis.

recommendation.title: Recommendation Systems
recommendation.description: Offer personalized experiences with algorithms that predict your users' preferences with high accuracy.

generative.title: Generative AI
generative.description: Create textual, visual, or audio content with our generative models that produce creative and innovative results.

iot.title: Smart IoT Solutions
iot.description: Connect your devices to AI models to analyze real-time data and make automated intelligent decisions.

caseStudy.title: Digital transformation of a pharmaceutical company
caseStudy.description: Discover how our AI solution optimized the supply chain and accelerated research for one of the world's leading pharmaceutical companies.

testimonials.title: They trust us
